## Pack List

**IMPORTANT:** This accommodation does not include: top & bottom sheets, pillowcases and bath towels. The accommodation does include doona/quilts with covers, pillows without covers, tea towels, hand towels and bathmats.

Essentials:

 - [ ] Bible
 - [ ] Towels
 - [ ] Pillowcase (or just your own pillow)
 - [ ] Linen for the bed OR sleeping bag
 - [ ] Toiletries
 - [ ] Clothes (It will be [cold](http://www.bom.gov.au/vic/forecasts/phillipisland.shtml))
 

Almost Essential:

- [ ] Your favourite plushie

Optional:

- [ ] Musical instruments
- [ ] Games
- [ ] Snacks
